Sony Vegas Movie Studio HD Platinum:
====================================

Contains everything needed to create HD-movies. Powerful compositing, color correction and instruments to create sound effects let you get professional results in his home studio. Vegas Movie Studio interface provides the user with all necessary without having to walk through menus to the call of a module or operation. The number of undo / redo actions is not limited. The function of recording CD, DVD and Blu-ray disc is fully integrated into the video editor, so you can easily create professional-level drives.

Vegas Movie Studio HD:
======================

Add special effects, transitions, titles and music
Zoom, rotate and pan images in video
Create professional-looking business presentations
Removing the effect of "red eye"
Simultaneous monitoring of video on a local and an external monitor
Unlimited use of video objects on a single track
Built-in preview window results
More than 500 effects, transitions and effects
Support for VST and DirectX effects plug-ins
